About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment; closed Good Friday and Christmas Day. Introductory brochure available.

About.Acquisition focus: The Memorabilia Centre collects all items relating to a history of scouting in general and to NSW in particular. (95% in-house).

About.Major holdings: NSW Scout Association; The Scout Association of Australia and various branches; and World Scouting Associations: Books, magazines, minutes, photographs, group histories, correspondence, newspaper articles 1907-1992.
